name: World of Warriors
description:
World of Warriors is an epic combat and adventure strategy game! Journey across the vast Wildlands and amass an army of history's greatest warriors, from Romans and Vikings to Knights and Samurai. Battle the mighty Skull Army and take on players from around the world in the epic new ARENA mode!

PLEASE NOTE! World of Warriors is completely free to play, however some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.

Fight, Train and Evolve your Army in the epic World of Warriors!

5/5 “There is nothing quite like World of Warriors in mobile gaming today”

5/5 “Beautiful artwork, an immersive and well thought-out game world, accessible gameplay with a real layer of strategic depth and planning... World of Warriors has it all.”

5/5 “The new Arena mode is awesome! I love fighting fellow fans with my band of warriors.”

= FEATURES =

- FREE TO PLAY
- Stunningly beautiful 3D graphics, amazing sound design and AAA production values.
- Amass an awesome army of historically accurate real-life warriors.
- Unleash mind-blowing special attacks upon fearsome opponents.
- Hone your skills and perfect your strategy to outplay and out-think opponents in the ARENA where the toughest players from around the world battle it out.
- Battle through the vast Wildlands to defeat evil King Boneshaker and his Skull Army of minions and bosses.
- Collect materials and craft powerful Talismans to tip the tide of battle in your favor.
- Train and Evolve your warriors to reach the highest heights and unlock the true power of your army.
- Daily and Weekly events to take part in.
- Compete against others for rare and exclusive prizes.

= DEVICE SUPPORT =
This game is compatible with iPhone 4S and above, and iPad 2 and above. However, for the following devices, we recommend that players clear all notifications and re-start their device for the optimal playing experience:
- iPad 2
- iPad Mini
- iPhone 4S
- All iPod Touches
